100.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

28.movie_plot: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

160.movie_plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

114.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
114.movie_plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

212.movie_plot: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

197.movie_plot: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop a hellish alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a cute struggling female rock singer who fancies him.

149.movie_plot: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

154.movie_plot: A father who can't keep his promises, dies in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman, who has the final chance to put things right with his son, before he is gone forever.

61.movie_plot: A Missouri farmer joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

145.movie_plot: The families of children who died, sue two companies for dumping toxic waste: a tort so expensive to prove, the case could bankrupt their lawyers.

177.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

66.movie_plot: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

72.movie_plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

56.movie_plot: A Chinese man who travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

132.movie_plot: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

6.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

138.movie_plot: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

43.movie_plot: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a third world country.

201.movie_plot: Remake of the 1958 sci-fi horror classic about a deadly blob from another planet which consumes everything in its path. Teenagers attempt without success to warn the townspeople, who refuse to take them seriously.

45.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

78.movie_plot: Scientists discover how to make people invisible, but their test subject becomes an insane killer who stalks them.

208.movie_plot: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

106.movie_plot: Aliens with conical crania crash-land on Earth.

96.movie_plot: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

35.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

10.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

136.movie_plot: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his female partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

170.movie_plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

110.movie_plot: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

77.movie_plot: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

194.movie_plot: James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.

75.movie_plot: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

39.movie_plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

176.movie_plot: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

209.movie_plot: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

107.movie_plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

69.movie_plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action, while attempting to liberate a twelve-year-old prostitute.

147.movie_plot: A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.

4.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

213.movie_plot: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

58.movie_plot: An off the charts genius who is home schooled and shunned after his last relative dies shows the unconscious residents of his town about connection awareness and the generosity of the spirit.

29.movie_plot: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

162.movie_plot: A party of archaeologists discovers the remnants of a mutant five-millennia-old Sumerian civilization living beneath a glacier atop a mountain in Mesopotamia.

112.movie_plot: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

139.movie_plot: When twelve mysterious spacecrafts appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.

202.movie_plot: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

211.movie_plot: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

135.movie_plot: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

87.movie_plot: A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and protect their new home.

196.movie_plot: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

1.movie_plot: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

164.movie_plot: Army doctor Robert Neville struggles to create a cure for the plague that wiped out most of the human race.

210.movie_plot: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

193.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

64.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

120.movie_plot: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

167.movie_plot: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

104.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

24.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

148.movie_plot: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth-century inventor-villain.

113.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
113.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

131.movie_plot: An idyllic sci-fi future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of 30.

52.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

98.movie_plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

189.movie_plot: Immortals Connor and Duncan MacLeod must join forces against Kell, an evil immortal who has become too strong for anyone to face alone.

25.movie_plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

156.movie_plot: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

184.movie_plot: Blair, a fighter pilot, joins an interstellar war to fight the evil Kilrathi who are trying to destroy the universe.

19.movie_plot: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone who must continue her battle against the aliens. Along with a crew of space pirates, Ripley must also prevent the deadly aliens from reaching Earth.

93.movie_plot: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

51.movie_plot: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

3.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

127.movie_plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

95.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

21.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

180.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

134.movie_plot: Planet Spaceballs' President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

108.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

124.movie_plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

146.movie_plot: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

54.movie_name: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion (1997)
54.movie_plot: Two dim-witted, inseparable friends hit the road for their ten-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

101.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
101.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

159.movie_plot: One of the first science fiction films to attempt a high level of accurate technical detail tells the story of the first trip to the Moon.

32.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

205.movie_plot: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

182.movie_plot: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

89.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

71.movie_plot: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

116.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

188.movie_plot: During the Second American Civil War in 2017, Barb Wire owns a nightclub called the Hammerhead. Things become complicated when her ex-lover Axel Hood, who is married to the fugitive Corrina Devonshire, re-enters her life.

166.movie_plot: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.
